body:
Since we moved from `travis-ci.org` to `travis-ci.com` unit tests are failing. It seems the issue is that stdout and stderr are not captured by `pytest` and thus unit tests using `capfd` are failing.

### Steps to reproduce the issue

Run unit tests under `travis-ci.com`, see e.g. [this](https://travis-ci.com/github/spack/spack/jobs/330679066)

### Error Message

Not relevant

### Information on your system

Not relevant

### Additional information

The same issue is present on Github Actions, see #14220

- [ ] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
- [ ] I have run the failing commands in debug mode and reported the output
title: Unit tests are failing on travis-ci.com
